Software Management Consultants, Inc. (SMCI) is an IT solutions leader in the many business communities we serve. Founded in 1983 and headquartered in Glendale, California, SMCI offers contract and contract-to-hire assignments, direct-hire assignments, management consulting, and managed services IT solutions. Clients are principally Fortune 1000 companies from diverse industries; our candidates are among the most highly skilled IT professionals in the industry. SMCI is recognized year after year in the Business Journal’s Book of Lists in the markets we serve.

MDI Group is a results-driven, professional services firm providing IT solutions that enable clients to achieve critical business objectives. Founded in 1988, MDI Group has successfully placed over 7,000 consultants in all major technical disciplines at nearly 1,500 companies since its inception. Today, MDI Group has over 500 consultants working across the nation out of offices in Atlanta, GA; Dallas, TX; Greenville, SC; and Phoenix, AZ.

SilverStage Real Estate Services, LLC offers a dynamic, innovative, marketing strategy that assists in the sale of vacant homes.  SilverStage provides upscale furnishings and accessories for our client's vacant properties, we create a "model home " atmosphere.  Today's market demands the highest level of skill, knowledge and creative thinking from Realtors.  This service gives Realtors and Homeowners the tools they need to succeed, at no charge. We provide Residence Managers who are strategically chosen for a home based on their furnishings ability to create the best "lifestyle experience" for a prospective buyer.  We professionally screen, certify and insure our Residence Managers.  Home owners holding costs are greatly reduced as our Residence Manager's maintain the homes systems, deter vandalism and theft, as well as assume all utilities.  SilverStage maintains the landscape and pool.
